column4: ubuntu 11.10 - am missing applications places system menu items.  How do I get the back.  New fresh Wubi install.
hut your Super/Windows button or clic on the ubuntu icon
you can clic application and all will show up
-  where or what is Super / Windows button
- where is application to click it?
-  hitting super windows key on kybd only brings up search window... does not give me menu on top of screen for  Applications - Places - System
clic the icons that appear down it and you can acces files, apps, etc
all I see is the ubuntu linux filesystem.   how do I get to Windows files ?
you can open the windows partitio with nautilus, the file manager
- ok. newbie here.  how do I get to ,  or how do I open nautilus, the file manager ?
just open your home, it's right there in the launcher
ok.  open home.  have icons here.  which folder is windows files ?
ok.  I have opened Home.  I now have a bunch of choices.     which icon leads to windows file system.
you should see the windows partition in the sidebar, sda something
on left side is- Computer  Home Desktop documents downloads music pictures .. etc
forget all about i said, never liked wubi, never used again; almoxarife seems to know a little more about it, have you listened to himÂ¿
